availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, merchant. Washington County, Kentucky native. Married to Isabella Edwards. Father of Thomas Edwards, William H. Edwards, Mary B. Edwards, James W. Edwards, Martha A. Edwards, John B. Edwards, Charles Edwards, and Ada Edwards. Hatter in Harrodsburg, Mercer County in 1850. Merchant in Boyle County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, p. 364A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle County, p. 944.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 405A.
Find A Grave, "George Washington Edwards (27 Dec 1812-19 Nov 1900)," Memorial #87168620, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/87168620 (accessed July 2, 2019).
